channel.title: CVE Feed for VeronaLabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VeronaLabs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38074|2024-08-03T10:45:52.402Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20statistics
item.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP Statistics plugin <= 13.2.10 versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-27231|2024-08-03T05:25:32.082Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20statistics
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in WP Statistics versions prior to 13.2.0 because it improperly processes a platform parameter. By exploiting this vulnerability, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-30454|2024-08-02T01:32:07.524Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25920|2024-03-27T05:45:44.417Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-30454|2024-03-29T16:30:14.635Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-34811|2024-06-06T19:14:12.390Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-24881|2024-06-04T17:42:57.461Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms%20%E2%80%93%20messaging%20%26%20sms%20notification%20for%20wordpress%2C%20woocommerce%2C%20gravityforms%2C%20etc
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc: from n/a through 6.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-34811|2024-08-02T02:59:22.605Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.5.1.
